de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core2d
Class RandomTree2d

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.lmu.dbs.jforest.util.workergroup.ScheduledThread
          de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core.RandomTree
              de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core2d.RandomTree2d
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RandomTree2d
extends RandomTree

Represents one random decision tree. Extend this to create randomized decision trees for various applications.

Author:
Thomas Weber

                    int maxDepth)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a tree instance for recursion into a new thread. The arguments are just used to transport the arguments of growRec to the new thread. See method growRec source code.

java.lang.Exception
